Posts.Content: Hi everyone – It can be awful losing your hair everywhere – on your head, from your eyes, and yes, your eyebrows and eyelashes. I know it was personally devastating for me when I was sixteen and going through chemo. Remember, just because you are battling cancer doesn’t mean that you can’t look and feel beautiful – I think doctors often forget this! Love, strength and survival, Britta
Posts.Title: Eyelashes
